jobs_sample.title: Senior Statistical Consultant
jobs_sample.description: Minimum Qualifications A Master’s degree in Statistics, Biostatistics, or a related field Strong understanding of a wide range of statistical methodologies. A minimum of 2 years’ experience as a statistical consultant or a data scientist. Demonstrated experience with outreach and relationship building. Proficiency in statistical software including R and SAS . Experience with Python. Demonstrated ability to work as the lead consultant responsible for designing and implementing consultancy projec…

jobs_sample.title: Statistical Consultant (Research Associate)
jobs_sample.description: Position Summary We have an immediate opening for a Research Associate – Statistician position in the Indiana Statistical Consulting Center within IU Research at Indiana University, Bloomington. The Indiana Statistical Consulting Center ( ISCC ) provides statistical support on all IU campuses, as well as external universities and organizations. Services include (1) power and sample size calculations, preliminary data analysis, and other grant related support for faculty in the proposal or pre-p…
